title: 1,000 sq ft 1 bed 1 bath with washer/dryer in unit Gold Coast
posting_body: This rarely available penthouse level west facing condo offers 1,000 sq feet of completely modernized and offers floor to ceiling breathtaking west facing views and an open living/dining area perfect for entertaining.
The kitchen offers an opening for breakfast bar and two bar stools.
The kitchen is tastefully updated with stainless steel appliances and dishwasher.
Extra large primary bedroom is large enough to accommodate a king size bed with room to spare and fully built out wall of closets.
The bathroom features granite countertops and double vanity sink.
The building is nestled on one of the most sought after streets in the Gold Coast and the building staff and amenities are 5 star.
The tenured door staff truly offers white glove service from the package room to 24hr security and concierge level service.
Full amenity floor has access to an award-winning party room with grills and iconic downtown views, full-size pool, sun deck, and full gym."
Many Highlights of the building listed below Premier location in heart of the Gold Coast neighborhood Floor-to-ceiling windows.
Lake and skyline views from the north, east, and south, city views from the west 1 bedroom unit (1000 SF)

In-unit HVACs for central air and heat control In-building garage parking available through SP+ Parking Management Services Walk score: 100% Nearby grocery stores, shops, parks, nightlife 20-minute walk to the Loop 24/7 door staff with double coverage Cable/wifi package included Party room Exercise room: cardio, weight lifting, barre, floor work area; water-bottle filler Outdoor pool with lounge chairs and tables Barbecue grill deck with umbrella tables Other outdoor relaxation areas Package room and optional in-unit delivery service with digital tracking Business center Laundry room Laundry service/Dry cleaners Secure bike room Vending machines Professionally managed by Sudler
